movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: great despite critics slams
review: After hearing all the hype and reading critics reviews, I left the movie feeling exactly as I expected - great.  The movie was not the best movie ever made.  I never expected it to be.  I expected it to be a movie geared towards 9 year old boys.  If you don't put on your kid goggles while watching the movie, of course you're not going to like it.  Watch it from the point of view of a 9 year old boy and you'll love it.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: just as I expected
review: The movie played up to all my expectations.  After having heard numerous reviews and having read the book, I expected the special effects to be great, Jar Jar to be annoying and Darth Maul to be fascinating, but not having enough character development.  I do have to say that Jar Jar was not quite as annoying to me as everyone made him out to be.

movie_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
title: not worth the hype
review: The movie, while entertaining, was disappointing given the hype around it. Several have said this would be the 'picture of the year.'  I doubt it. While there is a lot to tell, the movie seemed to go for a long time.  The character development seemed a bit shallow.  The timing of events and moods seemed a bit off.
